bike.description: 6061 aluminum triple gauge main tubes w/hydroformed top tube, sloping design for menJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs, step through design for ladies, replaceable derailleur hanger, eyeletted dropouts
bike.paint_description: M: Midnight Blue or Monterey Grey; F: Midnight Blue or Pearl White

components.description: RST 777 suspension, coil spring & MCU, external preload adjustment, 50mm travel
Weinmann ZAC-19 double wall alloy rims, 36H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
CST Marathon/Tour with silver safety stripe, 700 x 38c
Shimano Altus RD-M310 rear and Shimano FD-M191 front, 31.8mm clamp, top swing/dual pull front
Comfort platform style with TPE non-slip insert
Comfort hi-rise, steel, 25.4 x 80mm rise x 15JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 640mm
Jamis alloy angle-adjustable, 90mm with 150mm quill (14–17"), 110mm with 180mm quill (18–23")
Anatomic triple density kraton grip with end plug
Suspension alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm with alloy clamp and QR seatpin
Jamis Comfort with memory foam, synthetic suede cover, burnished sides and bumper springs with satin steel rails, gender specific
